para.sentence: \frac{x}{1+x}<\ln\left(1+x\right)<x, if x>-1, x\neq 0, x<-\ln\left(1-x\right)<\frac{x}{1-x}, if x<1, x\neq 0, |\ln\left(1-x\right)|<\tfrac{3}{2}x, if 0<x\leq 0.5828\dots, \ln x\leq x-1, if x>0, \ln x\leq a(x^{1/a}-1), if a, x>0, |\ln\left(1+z\right)|\leq-\ln\left(1-|z|\right), if |z|<1.
For more inequalities involving the logarithm function seeMitrinović (1964, pp. 75–77),Mitrinović (1970, pp. 272–276), andBullen (1998, pp. 159–160).
In (4.5.7)–(4.5.12) it is assumed that x\neq 0.

e^{-x/(1-x)}<1-x<e^{-x}, if x<1, 1+x<e^{x}, if -\infty<x<\infty, e^{x}<\frac{1}{1-x}, if x<1, \frac{x}{1+x}<1-e^{-x}<x, if x>-1, x<e^{x}-1<\frac{x}{1-x}, if x<1, e^{x/(1+x)}<1+x, if x>-1, e^{xy/(x+y)}<\left(1+\frac{x}{y}\right)^{y}<e^{x}, if x>0, y>0, e^{-x}<1-\tfrac{1}{2}x, if 0<x\leq 1.5936\dots , \tfrac{1}{4}|z|<|e^{z}-1|<\tfrac{7}{4}|z|, if 0<|z|<1, |e^{z}-1|\leq e^{|z|}-1\leq|z|e^{|z|}, if z\in\mathbb{C}.
For more inequalities involving the exponential function seeMitrinović (1964, pp. 73–77),Mitrinović (1970, pp. 266–271), andBullen (1998, pp. 81–83).
